name: Biotec Growthlab
description:
Biotec Growthlab Submission to "MyFirstGameJam2023 Winter"

You are a Scientist working in a BioLab growing plants to earn funds and finaly upgrade your laboratory!

The process is simple, get a seed, plant it, refill the resources and if the plant finishs it grwoth, you can convert it to a container and deliver it. Finaly, you send the train with three containers, and earn money for your work! - then get to the Upgrade Console, and buy what ever you need to get better with your workcycle.

This Game was a learning expiriance with the Game Creator 2. I didn't write one line of code. Everything is made with the Visual Scripting of the GameCreator 2 tool for Unity.

It also is my first time using my Voice to explain things. I hope it's not to confusing for you. 

I had a very good expirience, got far with it, and found some "dead ends" with the tool. I like the workflow, its easy and extendable. 

I hope you like the game I created.

Controlls:

Keyboard & Mouse  (WASD, E- Interact, Space - Jump)

or

Controller

MUSIC

Music was created by Polegacy
